item.description:
Turning the Key: Stop Sitting on your Assets

Did you know that you could have tons of money available for your deals - right in your own backyard?

Equity Expert, Pam Provo will be discussing how to use your own equity and other assets to safely and conservatively grow wealth, and triple your retirement assets!

She'll also cover strategies used by financial institutions and the affluent to help those at every economic level unlock the earning power of the assets they already have!

The strategies Pam shares not only open doors for funding deals, but also provide a great way to secure your financial future. Of note, she'll be speaking about:

* Creating Millions by leveraging the "Idle Equity" in your properties
* Strategies used by the Ultra-Wealthy Banks that everyone should know
* Her three step system that will secure Your Financial Future
* Using your equity to reduce - and often eliminate - taxes
* Building equity faster and tripling your retirement assets

Pam Provo is a Successful Asset Acquisition Advisor located in Shrewsbury, Massachusetts, and co-author of "Stop Sitting on Your Assets". She was the Vice President of Provo Financial Services, Inc. for five years and has 15 years as a Consumer Advocate under her belt. She is passionate about helping people with fiscal responsibility, and even won the Worcester Business Journal's "Forty Under 40" Award in 2003 for business leaders who value giving back to the community.



Pre-Register for Turning the Key and save $5.00!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: Turning the Key "Stop Sitting on your Assets!"
